New Records: Sri Lanka completed the highest ever chase on this ground and the highest ever chase against Afghanistan in T20s
Key Match Events: Rahmanullah Gurbaz scored 84 off 45 balls for Afghanistan
Danushka Gunathilaka and Bhanuka Rajapaksa's cameos helped Sri Lanka win the match
Rashid Khan took 1/39 in 4 overs for Afghanistan
Naveen-ul-Haq took 2/40 in 4 overs for Afghanistan
Maharoof praised Gunathilaka for proving a lot of people wrong
Gurbaz said playing franchise cricket has helped Afghanistan's team to compete in big competitions
Pre-Game Insights: Maharoof predicted Afghanistan as firm favourites for him
Naveed Nawaz said Afghanistan's bowlers are inexperienced but they are very much up to it
Post-Match Reflections: Winning Captain Dasun Shanaka said it's the belief of the dressing room that helped them win the match
Losing Captain Mohammed Nabi said Afghanistan were short by 20-25 runs and also didn't field well or bowl in the right areas
Gurbaz said they were disappointed with the result but that's cricket
Bhanuka Rajapaksa said they needed to be cautious when the spinners came into play
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sri Lanka's death bowling was praised for winning them the match
Afghanistan had more than their fair share of chances to put the game to bed
The match was a competitive one and will give Sri Lanka a load of confidence going into the game against India on Tuesday
